creator: vargok@yahoo.com
text:
Hi,
  The manager application does not prompt for credentials; it simply returns 403.  Using Firefox 1.5 (RHEL-5).  If you add the user:pass@ to the URL, it lets me in.
At the very least, the documentation should be updated to indicate that you have to put the creds in there, as you won't be prompted.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Looks like you have some cached credentials on your browser. Please use the users list if you need more help fixing this.
